title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Collaborative Scientific Inquiry Using Tablet-Based Virtual Manipulatives

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively solve scientific inquiry problems using tablet-based virtual manipulation tools.
Learners can distinguish collaborative strategies based on the presence or absence of external scripts under 1:1 or 1:m equipment conditions.
Learners can effectively acquire scientific knowledge while managing cognitive load in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
